comment:
* The {@link AdvertisingSetParameters} provide a way to adjust advertising preferences for each
 * Bluetooth LE advertising set. Use {@link AdvertisingSetParameters.Builder} to create an instance
 * of this class.

variables.name: INTERVAL_HIGH
variables.comment:
* Advertise on low frequency, around every 1000ms. This is the default and preferred
     * advertising mode as it consumes the least power.

variables.name: INTERVAL_MEDIUM
variables.comment:
* Advertise on medium frequency, around every 250ms. This is balanced between advertising
     * frequency and power consumption.

variables.name: INTERVAL_LOW
variables.comment:
* Perform high frequency, low latency advertising, around every 100ms. This has the highest
     * power consumption and should not be used for continuous background advertising.

variables.name: TX_POWER_ULTRA_LOW
variables.comment:
* Advertise using the lowest transmission (TX) power level. Low transmission power can be used
     * to restrict the visibility range of advertising packets.

variables.name: TX_POWER_LOW
variables.comment: Advertise using low TX power level.

variables.name: TX_POWER_MEDIUM
variables.comment: Advertise using medium TX power level.

variables.name: TX_POWER_HIGH
variables.comment:
* Advertise using high TX power level. This corresponds to largest visibility range of the
     * advertising packet.

variables.name: ADDRESS_TYPE_DEFAULT
variables.comment:
* Advertise own address type that corresponds privacy settings of the device.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: ADDRESS_TYPE_RANDOM
variables.comment:
* Generate and adverise own resolvable private address.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: ADDRESS_TYPE_RANDOM_NON_RESOLVABLE
variables.comment:
* Generate and advertise on non-resolvable private address.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isConnectable()
methods.comment: Returns whether the advertisement will be connectable.

methods.name: public boolean isDiscoverable()
methods.comment: Returns whether the advertisement will be discoverable.

methods.name: public boolean isScannable()
methods.comment: Returns whether the advertisement will be scannable.

methods.name: public boolean isLegacy()
methods.comment: Returns whether the legacy advertisement will be used.

methods.name: public boolean isAnonymous()
methods.comment: Returns whether the advertisement will be anonymous.

methods.name: public boolean includeTxPower()
methods.comment: Returns whether the TX Power will be included.

methods.name: public int getTxPowerLevel()
methods.comment: Returns the TX power level for advertising.

methods.name: public int getOwnAddressType()
methods.comment:
* @return the own address type for advertising
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
